titleStmt.title: A breviary of the history of the Parliament of England expressed in three parts, 1. The causes and beginnings of the civil war of England, 2. A short mention of the progress of that civil war, 3. A compendious relation of the original and progress of the second civil war / first written in Latine, & after into English by Thomas May.
titleStmt.author: May, Thomas, 1595-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Cottrel for Thomas Brewster ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
